Html:
For those of you that don't know, VS has had a Service Pack release back in March. This Service Pack allows for Silverlight profiling as well as other stability fixes in the IDE.

You can get it here: http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=207267

Note, you can't get it from that link if you are using the free versions (express).

Try here: http://www.microsoft.com/express/Downloads/#2010-Service-Pack-1
